name: plex
tagline: A media server for organizing and streaming personal libraries
description: Plex is a media server and streaming platform that lets you organize and stream personal media libraries across devices. It supports metadata fetching, transcoding, apps, and optional premium features.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Automatically organize movies, TV shows, music, and photos with metadata and artwork

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Stream to web browsers, mobile apps, smart TVs, and streaming devices

features.title: User Management
features.description: Create separate accounts for family members with individual watch history and preferences

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Synchronize playback with friends and family for shared viewing experiences
